[00:00.00]Steppin On Niggas (Explicit) - 21 Savage/Metro Boomin
[00:00.92]Lyrics by：Shéyaa Bin Abraham-Joseph/Leland Wayne/Joe Cooley/Rodney Oliver/Jeffrey Page
[00:01.85]Composed by：Shéyaa Bin Abraham-Joseph/Leland Wayne/Joe Cooley/Rodney Oliver/Jeffrey Page
[00:02.78]Step on a n***a in my Air Force 1s
[00:05.36]Step on a n***a in some f**kin' Jordan 1s
[00:08.08]Step on a n***a with this dirty-a*s gun
[00:10.43]It was one late night I was cruisin' the street
[00:12.99]We ain't had nothing to do so we was looking for beef
[00:15.66]Got a Glock in my hand and a stick in the Jeep
[00:18.52]Stomping n***as 'round town but I grew up on the East
[00:21.16]Roll the window down seen elbows and feet
[00:23.90]I was kickin' up smoke you was copping a plea
[00:26.54]Yeah we turned him to zaza now his face on a tee
[00:29.22]I be smokin' on opps roll 'em up by the P
[00:31.95]P
[00:32.18]Chopper keep shakin' the beat keep breakin'
[00:34.86]No I'm not a Muslim but I don't eat bacon
[00:37.24]Bacon
[00:37.51]Eyes look Asian she say that she Jamaican
[00:40.10]I bring her to the room we just f**king we ain't caking
[00:42.50]Caking
[00:44.34]Steppin' on n***as steppin' on n***as
[00:47.45]Steppin'
[00:49.68]Steppin' on n***as
[00:50.81]Steppin'

[01:01.29]Steppin'
[01:02.38]Steppin' on n***as
[01:03.46]Steppin' steppin'
[01:04.06]Got a Glock on my hip n***as hippity-hop
[01:06.80]He was dissin' on songs and that s**t got him shot
[01:09.43]Hit his block with a broom hit his block with a mop
[01:12.04]We ain't talking to b***hes we ain't talking to cops
[01:14.70]F**k 12
[01:15.41]Check the forecast I got galore cash
[01:18.08]Had them killers on your step like DoorDash
[01:20.84]F**k your baby daddy with his dork a*s
[01:23.36]We at the bottom n***a show me your extort pass
[01:26.21]All the opps fans they be imitating
[01:28.88]Blowing gunsmoke that's how we demonstrating
[01:31.51]Hit his baby mama while he had the baby
[01:34.27]Gave me good jaw I gave her penetration
[01:37.89]Steppin' on n***as steppin' on n***as

data.trans:
[ti:Steppin On n***as (Explicit)]
[ar:21 Savage/Metro Boomin]
[al:SAVAGE MODE II (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.92]//
[00:01.85]//
[00:02.78]我穿着耐克Air Force 1运动鞋 把敌人踩在脚下
[00:05.36]我穿着耐克Air Jordan 1运动鞋 把敌人踩在脚下
[00:08.08]用这把沾满鲜血的枪 把敌人踩在脚下
[00:10.43]深更半夜 我在街头游荡
[00:12.99]我们无所事事 所以我们到处惹事
[00:15.66]手里拿着一把格洛克枪 吉普车里还放着一把步枪
[00:18.52]到处游荡 干掉敌人 可我东部长大
[00:21.16]摇下车窗 看见熙熙攘攘的人群
[00:23.90]我吞云吐雾 你向我求饶
[00:26.54]我们让他大惊失色 现在他的脸印在T恤上
[00:29.22]我大杀四方 花点钱 干掉他们
[00:31.95]钞票
[00:32.18]枪声四起 音乐震耳欲聋
[00:34.86]我不是穆斯林 可我不会自己找死
[00:37.24]培根
[00:37.51]长着一双亚洲人的眼睛 可她说她是牙买加人
[00:40.10]我带她来到房间里 我们只是纵享欢愉 我们不会打情骂俏
[00:42.50]打情骂俏
[00:44.34]把敌人踩在脚下 把敌人踩在脚下
[00:47.45]狠狠教训他们
[00:49.68]把敌人踩在脚下
[00:50.81]狠狠教训他们
[00:51.59]把敌人踩在脚下
[00:52.65]狠狠教训他们
[00:54.92]把敌人踩在脚下 把敌人踩在脚下
[00:57.90]狠狠教训他们
[01:00.35]把敌人踩在脚下
[01:01.29]狠狠教训他们
[01:02.38]把敌人踩在脚下
[01:03.46]狠狠教训他们
[01:04.06]腰后别着一把格洛克枪 这些家伙蹦蹦跳跳
[01:06.80]他对我的歌说三道四 这会给他招来杀身之祸
[01:09.43]拿着自动步枪血洗他的街区 全副武装 血洗他的街区
[01:12.04]我们不会跟妹子说话 我们不会跟警察说话
[01:14.70]该死的警察
[01:15.41]注意一下天气预报 我有不少钞票
[01:18.08]花钱找杀手主动上门 就像DoorDash送餐服务
[01:20.84]把你的人杀个片甲不留
[01:23.36]我们来自社会底层 给我看看你的实力
[01:26.21]所有对手的歌迷 他们只是在模仿
[01:28.88]开枪扫射 这就是我们的证明方式
[01:31.51]跟他视如珍宝的妹子缠绵
[01:34.27]好好服侍我 我让她大开眼界
[01:37.89]把敌人踩在脚下 把敌人踩在脚下
